name: espresso-addict
author: Ironboy
description: A small text adventure - written in vanilla JS

scripts.test: cross-env npx cucumber-js tests/features --import tests/features/support --import tests/features/step-definitions --world-parameters "{\"browserName\":\"chrome\"}" --format json:tests/results/chrome.json && node ./generateReport && start tests/results/chrome.html
scripts.testOnly: npx cucumber-js tests/features --import tests/features/support --import tests/features/step-definitions --world-parameters "{\"browserName\":\"chrome\"}" --format json:tests/results/chrome.json
